mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookshelf(status, isbn, user_no) VALUES(#{status}, #{isbn}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT status FROM bookshelf WHERE isbn=#{isbn} AND user_no=#{userNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bookshelf WHERE user_no=#{userNo} AND isbn=#{isbn} AND status=#{status}
mapper.select: SELECT status_no FROM bookshelf WHERE isbn=#{isbn} AND user_no=#{userNo} AND status IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE bookshelf SET status=#{status} WHERE isbn=#{isbn} AND user_no=#{userNo};
